sentences.sentence: If you give up exercise, your muscles shrink and fat increases. By the same token, if you expend more energy you will lose fat.
sentences.translation: 如果你放弃锻炼，肌肉就会萎缩，脂肪会增多。同样地，如果你消耗较多的体能，你就会减掉脂肪。

sentences.sentence: Growth, reproduction, and daily metabolism all require an organism to expend energy.
sentences.translation: 生长、繁殖和日常的新陈代谢都需要有机体来消耗能量。

sentences.sentence: Extreme athletes expend lots of energy breaking down and repairing and building muscles.
sentences.translation: 极限运动员消耗大量能量来分解、修复和塑造肌肉。
